Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.characterCards

Class CharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.utils.ObservableSubject
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characterCards.CharacterCard
Direct Known Subclasses:
BanCharacter, Banker, InfluenceCard, Musician, PostMan, ProfCard, Vassal, WithStudents
public abstract class CharacterCard extends ObservableSubject
Abstract class which define the common structure of every character card

    • checkRequirements

      public boolean checkRequirements(Player currPlayer)
      checks if the card is playable and if the students selected by the player are correct (if required by the card)
      Parameters:
      currPlayer - the Player who wants to activate the card (the current player of the game)
      Returns:
      true if the requirements are satisfied false if the requirements are not satisfied
